basics.name: Rajesh Shrestha
basics.label: Ph.D. Student
basics.summary: A 4th year Ph.D. student in Department of Computer Science at Oregon State University. My research interests are in the area of unsupervised learning including generative models, representation learning, and multi-modal learning. I am advised by Dr. Xiao Fu.

work.name: Oregon State University
work.summary: My work involves using supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques to solve real-world problem and the theoretical analysis of the proposed methods. I am working on the use of pretrained generative diffusion model for conditional image generation, and solving inverse problem.

work.name: Oregon State University
work.summary: Collaborated closely with the instructor to develop and deliver course materials, and to provide feedback on student performance. I was responsible for developing autograder, grading assignments, and holding office hours.

work.name: Fusemachines Inc.
work.summary: My work involved setting data pipelines, developing machine learning models and their depolyment for various clients. The main projects that I worked on were Push Notification Recommendation System, and Optical Character Recognition System. I also worked on machine learning models for Fusemachines' products. In addition, I worked on developing contents for the online learning platform of Fusemachines called fuse.ai.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered in the earthquake relief program in Nepal. My work involved distributing relief materials including food, blankets and tents to the affected people. I also worked in the installation of temporary shelters and toilets along with data collection regarding the damage caused by the earthquake.

awards.title: Excellent Project Award
awards.summary: Award given for dedication and excellence in the project of Push Notification Recommendation System

awards.title: Private and Secure AI Scholarship
awards.summary: Ranked in top 200/5000 in a challenge course and got a scholarship for Computer Vision Nanodegree

awards.title: AI Fellowship
awards.summary: Ranked in top 20 and got a fellowship for Edx AI Micromaster course from Columbia University

awards.title: Best Engineering Award, Panasonic Award
awards.summary: Represented Nepal in ABU Robocon 2016 and won award for consistent performance in control and navigation of an autonomous robot

awards.title: Fellowship for Bachelor's
awards.summary: Ranked among top 100 out of 15000 applicants and got a full scholarship for Bachelor's in Electronics and Communication Engineering

certificates.name: Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning

references.name: Professor Xiao Fu
references.reference: Ph.D. Major Advisor, Oregon State University

projects.name: Camera Model Identification to authenticate digital images
projects.summary: Use of image processing and modern deep learning with ensembling techniques for source camera identification of digital image
